thread.title: Report finds North Glasgow College governance Arrangements were “unacceptable” (Scottish Parliament)
thread.title_full: Report finds North Glasgow College governance Arrangements were “unacceptable” (Scottish Parliament) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Report finds North Glasgow College governance Arrangements were “unacceptable” (Scottish Parliament)
text: ( Source : Scottish Parliament ) 13.10. 2015 Required levels of governance at North Glasgow College were 'unacceptable', according to a report published today by the Scottish Parliament's Public Audit Committee . The report - The 2012 /13 audit
